name: HH_PBLST_WOUNDS
description: Contains Home Health problem list wound information.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the problem list.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: WOUND_STAGE_C_NAME
columns.description: Wound stage.  Links to category table ZC_WOUND_STAGE.

columns.name: WOUND_ODOR_C_NAME
columns.description: Wound odor.  Links to category table ZC_WOUND_ODOR.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Wound contact serial number.  A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.  Links to table PAT_ENC.

columns.name: WOUND_ENTRY_USR_ID
columns.description: User ID of user who entered wound data.  Links to table CLARITY_EMP.

columns.name: WOUND_ENTRY_USR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
